body_content.explanation: not relating to harmony (= a pleasant musical sound made by different notes being played or sung at the same time):
examples: The non-harmonic sound on his new album has disappointed many of his long-term fans.

body_content.explanation: not consisting of a special note that sounds when a musical note is played that is different from the main note:
examples: Non-harmonic tones, also called embellishing tones, are notes that do not fit with the chord in question.
